personal.name: Bablu Kumar
personal.title: Full-Stack Developer | Open Source Enthusiast
personal.tagline: Focused on building scalable web applications and contributing to open source projects that make a difference.

about.intro: I'm Bablu Kumar, a dedicated Full-Stack Developer with a solid foundation in modern web technologies. Currently completing my BCA with a CGPA of 7.47,  I combine strong academic knowledge with hands-on experience in building scalable and user-friendly web applications.
about.passion: I am passionate about crafting efficient, clean, and maintainable code. I enjoy building applications that solve real-world problems and contributing to open-source projects that make a meaningful impact.

projects.name: RentMyRoam
projects.description: RentMyRoam is an Airbnb-inspired full-stack Node.js project that allows users to create, view, edit, and delete rental property listings with a clean, responsive UI using Bootstrap 5.

projects.name: Task Management App
projects.description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates using Socket.io. Features drag-and-drop functionality, team collaboration, and progress tracking.

projects.name: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive weather dashboard with beautiful visualizations and forecasts. Integrates multiple weather APIs and provides location-based weather information.

experience.title: Junior Full-Stack Developer
experience.description: Developing and maintaining web applications using React and Node.js. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions. Improved application performance by 40% through code optimization.

contributions.title: OpenSeadragon Project
contributions.description: Fixed Zoomify gridSize calculation bug to align with official Zoomify CLI behavior (PR #2772), improving image rendering for odd-sized images. This contribution enhanced the library's compatibility and reliability for thousands of users.
